text: Mochtar Kusumaatmadja (April 17, 1929 â€“ June 6, 2021) was an Indonesian politician. He was born in Batavia, Dutch East Indies. Kusumaatmadja was the Minister of Law and Human Rights from 1973 until 1978. From 1978 until 1988, he was the Minister of Foreign Affairs. Kusumaatmadja died on June 6, 2021 in Jakarta, aged 92.Mantan Menteri Luar Negeri Mochtar Kusumaatmadja Meninggal ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Indonesian politicians
title: Mochtar Kusumaatmadja
